sentences.en: Your baby's heartbeat will be monitored continuously.
sentences.cn: 您小宝宝的心跳将会受到持续监听。

sentences.en: The civil war has raged almost continuously since 1976.
sentences.cn: 自1976年以来，激烈的内战几乎持续不断。

sentences.en: The orientation of the planet's orbit is changing continuously.
sentences.cn: 该行星轨道的方向不断变化。
